verbs.description: [ARGM-ADV: < p > More so than ever before] , [ARG0: the sports world] [V: finds] [ARG1: itself involved in the larger aspect of American society and politics] . Obviously , the backdrop here has to be President Donald Trump ’s rift with the NFL regarding national anthem protests and the outspoken stars of the basketball world taking on POTUS.</p >
